thread.title: Customer Mr Davis
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Customer Mr Davis

author: Customer Mr Davis
title: Customer Mr Davis
text: I bought a Triton Miami shower as a direct replacement for my Triton t80 si after being advised that it is exactly the right replacement fitting plumbing connections etc without any further work or additional fittings. The person i spoke to was Polite friendly and knowledgeable giving excellent service. My shower arrived the next day and fitted in less than an hour. This was not the customer service i recieved when i firstly phoned Triton showers direct so my advice is if you have a problem phone Shower Doctor they know what there talking about .
